alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marion and northwestern Lamar Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Improve, or 12 miles east of Columbia, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Improve around 450 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
